AT.name: Olympia Rising
AT.description: Iola wurde in die Unterwelt verbannt und muss sich durch Horden tödlicher Kreaturen kämpfen, um zum Berg Olymp zu gelangen. Iola ist eine junge Kriegerin, die in die Unterwelt verbannt wurde, nachdem Sie vorzeitiges Ende fand. Sie muss sich durch die verschiedenen, verzwickten Regionen von Hades Reich navigieren und sich durch Horden von tödlichen Kreaturen kämpfen, während sie ihre Flucht und den Weg zum Berg Olymp plant. Springe, klettere, schlage und verbrenne deinen Weg durch jede Stufe. - Schnelle Luftkämpfe schleudern dich durch die Unterwelt, während du Feinde mit deinem Schwert in Stücke schlägst und sie mit kraftvoller Magie verbrennst. - Navigiere mit flüssiger Beweglichkeit durch tödliche Umgebungen und suche nach dem effektivsten Weg, um den Gipfel zu erklimmen. Töte mehrere Gegner hintereinander, während du in der Luft bist - baue eine lange Kombo auf, um mehr Münzen zu sammeln, um Charon den Fährmann zu bezahlen und durch die vielen Tore der Unterwelt zu gelangen. - Erforsche 6 einzigartige und verzwickte Umgebungen der Unterwelt - jede bietet unterschiedliche Herausforderungen, Kreaturen und schwere Bossbegegnungen, die es zu überwinden gilt.

AU.name: Olympia Rising
AU.description: Iola is a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after meeting an untimely end. She must navigate through the various twisted regions of Hades' domain, fighting through hoards of deadly creatures as she attempts her escape, making her way to Mount Olympus. Jump, climb, slash, and incinerate your way through each stage. - Fast-paced aerial combat propels you up through the Underworld, as you slash enemies to bits with your blade and incinerate them with powerful magic. - Navigate through deadly environments with fluid maneuverability, looking for the most efficient way to climb to the top. Chain enemy kills as you jump through the air - build up a big combo to earn even more coins to pay Charon the Ferryman and pass through the many gates of the Underworld. - Explore 6 unique, twisted environments of the Underworld - each offering different challenges, creatures, and fierce boss encounters to overcome.

BG.name: Olympia Rising
BG.description: Iola is a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after meeting an untimely end. She must navigate through the various twisted regions of Hades' domain, fighting through hoards of deadly creatures as she attempts her escape, making her way to Mount Olympus. Chain enemy kills as you jump through the air - build up a big combo to earn even more coins to pay Charon the Ferryman and pass through the many gates of the Underworld. - Explore 6 unique, twisted environments of the Underworld - each offering different challenges, creatures, and fierce boss encounters to overcome.

BE.name: Olympia Rising
BE.description: Iola a été envoyée en Enfer et doit se frayer un chemin en combattant des hordes de créatures mortelles pour s’échapper et atteindre le Mont Olympe. Iola est une jeune guerrière qui a été envoyée en Enfer après sa funeste fin. Elle doit sillonner plusieurs régions étranges du domaine d’Hadès en combattant des hordes de créatures mortelles pour s’échapper et se frayer un chemin jusqu’au Mont Olympe. Sautez, escaladez, pourfendez et incinérez vos ennemis pour arriver à la fin de chaque niveau. - Des combats aériens rapides vous feront remonter vers la surface à mesure que vous découperez vos ennemis en morceaux avec votre épée ou les incinèrerez avec de puissants sorts. - Naviguez avec fluidité dans un environnement mortel en recherchant le chemin le plus efficace pour remonter à la surface. Tuez les ennemis à la chaine en sautant dans les airs. Accumulez un énorme combo pour gagner encore plus de pièces et ainsi payer Caron le Passeur pour traverser les nombreuses portes des Enfers. - Explorez 6 environnements uniques et étranges des Enfers. Chaque environnement propose des défis et des créatures différents ainsi qu'un affrontement intense avec un boss.

ES.name: Olympia Rising
ES.description: Iola ha acabado en el inframundo y tiene que luchar contra hordas de criaturas mortales para llegar al monte Olimpo. Iola es una joven guerrera que ha acabado en el inframundo después de morir de manera prematura. Tiene que cruzar las diversas regiones perversas de los dominios de Hades, luchando contra hordas de criaturas mortales mientras intenta escapar y llegar al monte Olimpo. Salta, trepa, corta e incinera para poder completar cada etapa. - El combate aéreo de ritmo rápido te hace ascender en el inframundo, a medida que cortas enemigos en pedazos con el filo de tu arma y los incineras con magia poderosa. - Cruza entornos mortales con movimientos fluidos en busca de la manera más eficiente de llegar a la cima. Mata varios enemigos a la vez a medida que saltas por el aire - acumula una gran combinación para ganar aún más monedas con el objetivo de pagar a Caronte el barquero y pasar a través de las muchas puertas del inframundo. - Explora 6 entornos únicos y perversos del Inframundo – en cada uno tienes que superar diferentes retos, criaturas y jefe feroces.

IT.name: Olympia Rising
IT.description: Iola è stata imprigionata negli Inferi e deve sconfiggere orde di creature mostruose per riuscire a raggiungere il Monte Olimpo. Iola è una giovane guerriera che ha raggiunto gli Inferi dopo una fine prematura. La giovane deve attraversare i diversi gironi a spirale dell’Ade, combattendo orde di creature pericolose, mentre cerca di fuggire e raggiungere il Monte Olimpo. Salta, arrampicati, taglia e incendia per superare ogni livello. - Veloci combattimenti aerei ti spingono verso la cima degli Inferi, mentre fai a pezzi i tuoi nemici con la tua spada e li incenerisci con potenti magie. - Muoviti attraverso ambienti mortali con estrema attenzione, in cerca del modo migliore per scalare la cima. Elimina i tuoi i nemici in serie saltando in aria, dai vita ad un combo per guadagnare ancora più monete per pagare Caronte, il traghettatore, e attraversare i vari cancelli degli Inferi. - Esplora 6 unici gironi a spirale degli Inferi, in ognuno di questi incontrerai sfide, creature e figure feroci da superare.

NL.name: Olympia Rising
NL.description: Iola is gedoemd tot de onderwereld en moet vechten tegen hordes dodelijke schepsels om zich een weg te banen naar de Olympusberg. Iola is een jonge strijdster die tot de onderwereld is gedoemd nadat haar leven voortijdig ten einde kwam. Ze moet door verscheidene afwisselende gebieden van het domein van Hades manoeuvreren, vechtend tegen hordes dodelijke schepsels, terwijl ze probeert te ontsnappen door zich een weg te banen naar de Olympusberg. Spring, klim, hak en brand je een weg door iedere etappe. - Flitsend luchtgevecht stuwt je omhoog door de Onderwereld, terwijl je vijanden tot moes hakt met je mes en ze verbrandt met krachtige magie. - Manoeuvreer door dodelijke gebieden met een ongekende wendbaarheid, op zoek naar de meest efficiënte weg om de top te beklimmen. Vermoord vijanden aan de lopende band terwijl je door de lucht springt - bouw een flinke combo op en verdien nog meer munten om Charon de Veerman te betalen en voorbij te gaan aan de vele poorten van de Onderwereld. - Ontdek 6 unieke, afwisselende gebieden van de Onderwereld - elk biedt verschillende uitdagingen, schepsels en ontmoetingen met meedogenloze bazen om te overwinnen.

NZ.name: Olympia Rising
NZ.description: Iola is a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after meeting an untimely end. She must navigate through the various twisted regions of Hades' domain, fighting through hoards of deadly creatures as she attempts her escape, making her way to Mount Olympus. PL.description: Iola is a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after meeting an untimely end. Jump, climb, slash, and incinerate your way through each stage. - Fast-paced aerial combat propels you up through the Underworld, as you slash enemies to bits with your blade and incinerate them with powerful magic. - Navigate through deadly environments with fluid maneuverability, looking for the most efficient way to climb to the top. Chain enemy kills as you jump through the air - build up a big combo to earn even more coins to pay Charon the Ferryman and pass through the many gates of the Underworld. - Explore 6 unique, twisted environments of the Underworld - each offering different challenges, creatures, and fierce boss encounters to overcome.

PT.name: Olympia Rising
PT.description: Iola foi lançada no Submundo e deve lutar contra multidões de criaturas mortais para chegar ao Monte Olimpo. Iola é uma jovem guerreira que foi lançada no Submundo depois de ter um fim inoportuno. Ela deve navegar pelas várias regiões distorcidas do domínio de Hades, lutando contra multidões de criaturas mortais, enquanto tenta fugir, para chegar ao Monte Olimpo. Pelo caminho, salte, suba, corte e queime em cada etapa. - O combate aéreo acelerado impele-o do Submundo para cima, à medida que corta os inimigos aos pedaços com a sua lâmina e os reduz a cinzas com magia poderosa. - Navegue por ambientes mortais com capacidade de manobra fluida, procurando a maneira mais eficaz de chegar ao topo. Acorrentar o inimigo mata enquanto salta pelos ares - construa uma grande combinação para ganhar ainda mais moedas para pagar ao Charon, o Barqueiro e passe pelos muitos portões do Submundo. - Explore 6 ambientes do Submundo exclusivos e distorcidos - oferecendo cada um deles desafios diferentes, criaturas e encontros com o chefe feroz a ultrapassar.

RU.name: Olympia Rising
RU.description: Айола попала в преисподнюю и теперь должна пробиваться сквозь орды смертельно опасных тварей, чтобы добраться до горы Олимп. Айола — молодая воительница, попавшая в преисподнюю после своей безвременной гибели. Она должна преодолеть разнообразные искажённые области домена Аида, пробиваясь сквозь орды смертоносных тварей в попытках сбежать и добраться до горы Олимп. Перепрыгивайте, перелезайте, рубите, испепеляйте всё, что станет на вашем пути на любом этапе. - Восхождение из преисподней — это динамичный воздушный бой, в котором вы изрубаете врагов клинком и сжигаете дотла могущественной магией. - Искусно преодолевайте смертельно опасные ландшафты в поисках наилучшего пути наверх. Составьте на своём пути длинное комбо из последовательных убийств, чтобы получить ещё больше монет, заплатить перевозчику душ Харону и пройти множество врат преисподней. - Исследуйте шесть неповторимых искажённых областей преисподней — находя в каждой новые задачи, тварей и неистовые схватки с боссами.

SE.name: Olympia Rising
SE.description: Iola is a young warrior who has been cast into the Underworld after meeting an untimely end. She must navigate through the various twisted regions of Hades' domain, fighting through hoards of deadly creatures as she attempts her escape, making her way to Mount Olympus. Jump, climb, slash, and incinerate your way through each stage. - Fast-paced aerial combat propels you up through the Underworld, as you slash enemies to bits with your blade and incinerate them with powerful magic. - Navigate through deadly environments with fluid maneuverability, looking for the most efficient way to climb to the top. Chain enemy kills as you jump through the air - build up a big combo to earn even more coins to pay Charon the Ferryman and pass through the many gates of the Underworld. - Explore 6 unique, twisted environments of the Underworld - each offering different challenges, creatures, and fierce boss encounters to overcome.
